Package assignment2

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment2.Book
  • public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Nick Thompson

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Book​(java.lang.String bookId, java.lang.String bookTitle, java.lang.String bookAuthor, java.lang.String bookPublicationYear)
      Class constructor that accepts an Id, Title, Author, Publication Year and creates a Book object with its borrower initialized to null.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getId()
      Public method that takes no arguments and returns the current Book object's bookId as a String.

      Public method that accepts a String as an argument and compares the current Book object's bookAuthor to the accepted argument.

      Public method that accepts a String as an argument and compares the current Book object's bookId to the accepted argument.
      boolean hasPublicationYear​(java.lang.String py)
      Public method that accepts a String as an argument and compares the current Book object's bookPublicationYear to the accepted argument.
      boolean isBorrowed()
      Public method that accepts no arguments.
      void lend​(Patron p)
      Public method that accepts a Patron object as an argument, and assigns the current Book object a borrower.
      void returnBook()
      Public method that sets the current Book object's borrower to null.

    • Method Detail

      • lend

        public void lend​(Patron p)
        Public method that accepts a Patron object as an argument, and assigns the current Book object a borrower. Calls the borrow(Book) method of the Patron class.
        Parameters:
        p -

      • returnBook

        public void returnBook()
        Public method that sets the current Book object's borrower to null.

      • hasId

        public boolean hasId​(java.lang.String bId)
        Public method that accepts a String as an argument and compares the current Book object's bookId to the accepted argument. Returns true if the current Book object's bookId equals the accepted String; returns false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        bId -
        Returns:

      • hasAuthor

        public boolean hasAuthor​(java.lang.String ba)
        Public method that accepts a String as an argument and compares the current Book object's bookAuthor to the accepted argument. Returns true if the current Book object's bookAuthor equals the accepted String; returns false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        ba -
        Returns:

      • hasPublicationYear

        public boolean hasPublicationYear​(java.lang.String py)
        Public method that accepts a String as an argument and compares the current Book object's bookPublicationYear to the accepted argument. Returns true if the current Book object's bookPublicationYear equals the accepted String; returns false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        py -
        Returns:

      • isBorrowed

        public boolean isBorrowed()
        Public method that accepts no arguments. Returns true if the current Book object's borrower is null; returns false otherwise.
        Returns:

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        Public method that takes no arguments and returns the current Book object's bookId as a String.
        Returns:

      • whoHasMe

        public Patron whoHasMe()
        Public method that takes no arguments and returns the current Book object's borrower. Will return a Patron object or null depending if the Book object has a borrower.
        Returns:

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Public method that takes no arguments. Overrides Java's built-in toString() method to return a String consisting of the current Book object's bookId;bookTitle;bookAuthor;bookPublicationYear.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
